description: HTML source code for a web-based database viewer interface, including styles and embedded JavaScript for dynamic content loading and interaction.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches and displays the list of available databases.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases, resets UI state.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses database-specific table list.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and displays data for a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Renders data into an HTML table with support for wide and nested data.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates table cell HTML, handling nulls, objects, long strings, and expandable content.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content when clicked.
